skins.shipDescription: Gato-class submarine ®C Bluegill, Hull Number SS-242.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Bluegill, Gato-class submarine. I saw action all over the sea and gave my enemies a real scare. Hehe, I'll shine on at this port, too!
skins.acquisition: I've finally found one! My own commander! ...Hehehe, from now on, you're Bluegill's commander!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander! Let's part these curtains, like... This! Hehe, now the sun's gleam reaches in here too!
skins.details: I wonder if there's a way to become friends with Yuubari, that girl cooped up in the science department...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sunny days are always good swimming days!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hey, that's not a blank sheet, that's Bluegill's personal file on the back! Look! I wrote the whole thing myself!
skins.secretaryIdle3: How long are you gonna have a staredown with your desk, Commander? C'mon, let's catch a break!
skins.secretaryTouch: You want a fight with me? You asked for it! Take *this*! Blue knockout punch!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Whoa, whoa! Commander! You've kinda crossed a line here!

skins.shipDescription: Look out for Bluegill's ultra-reliable defense, Intrepid! Hehehe, Commander, stay here and see the results of Bluegill's special training!
skins.acquisition: Look out for Bluegill's ultra-reliable defense, Intrepid! Hehehe, Commander, stay here and see the results of Bluegill's special training!
skins.login: I wish baseball was as easy as diving... I'll still give it my best shot, though! Bluegill's a go-getter!
skins.details: I've heard I can throw the ball faster if I have my feet raised, like a pitcher! ...It doesn't work like that?
skins.secretaryIdle1: With you and Coach Bogue helping me, I'm destined to become a pro player!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll stun everyone with my skills when the next baseball league rolls around!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Intrepid! Bluegill's by your back! Don't forget that!
skins.secretaryTouch: Is... this the proper throwing stance? I'll memorize it!
